38 enum class FontEncoding {
39  kASCII,
40  kUnicode

42 
44 struct FontCharacter {
45  unsigned long m_charCode; // Character code representing the glyph
46  unsigned int m_glyphIndex; // Freetype ID of the glyph
47  Vector<int, 2> m_size; // Size of glyph (in pixels)
48  Vector<int, 2> m_bearing; // Offset from baseline to left/top of glyph
49  unsigned int m_advance; // Offset to advance to next glyph (in 1/64th pixels)
50  Vector<int, 2> m_origin; // Coordinates of the top-left of the character in it's bitmap
51 };
52 
54 struct FontBitmap {
55  FontBitmap();
56  ~FontBitmap();
57 
58  uint32_t m_pixelSize;
59  TexturePacker m_texPacker;
60 };
61 
63 struct CharacterSet {
64 
65  FontCharacter* character(unsigned long charCode) {
66  return &m_characters[charCode];
67  }
68 
69  uint32_t m_pixelSize;
70  tsl::robin_map<unsigned long, FontCharacter> m_characters;
71 };
